task: Aleksander Iskra plans to rent a bike. The rental cost is {dollars}80 per month, and he must also pay a fixed cost of {dollars}25. Aleksander Iskra wants to spend no more than {dollars}419. If the rental is available only for whole months, what is the maximum number of months Aleksander Iskra can rent a bike? Which of the following equations properly represents this situation?
explanation: Choice B is correct. The equation 80h + 25 ≤ 419 represents the given situation. Subtracting 25 from both sides and dividing by 80 gives h ≤ 4. Since the rental is available only in whole months, the maximum months Aleksander Iskra can rent is 4.
